institution.value: Ouranos Consortium on Regional Climatology and Adaptation to Climate Change

title.value: PINS v1 : Portraits d'indices de la neige au sol

abstract.value: In the context of climate change, stakeholders and decision makers are in demand of easily accessible bias-adjusted projections of snow cover and their resulting indices to develop adaptation plans. To meet this need, we produced an ensemble of regional climate projections statistically bias adjusted of snow water equivalent (SWE) over the province of Qu√©bec.
